lines.text: A--HHH! Y-ou j.ust b-link-ed agai.n! Wo.ah! I thought you were a statue, I've been coming by here for years.

lines.speaker: Player
lines.text: Can you hear me? Are you ok?

lines.label: grog
lines.text: Jeez, you're really out of it... aaand you're covered in moss. Alright heyheyhey, don't worry, I've got my camp nearby, you can come hang out with me for a bit to get your bearings.

lines.speaker: NAME
lines.text: I'm <b>NAME<b> by the way, just traveling through. I used to live nearby but the forest's been shifting a lot lately, it's not good to stay in one place for too long.

lines.speaker: Player
lines.label: options

options.text: What's going on with the forest?

lines.notes: False choice w/ flavor options only

lines.speaker: NAME
lines.text: Well, I don't imagine you'd have really seen much, but some of the plants have gotten more... active. They're unhappy, and lashing out at folks that travel through or that they seem to think are threats.
lines.label: forestProblems

lines.speaker: NAME
lines.text: It's been going on for a few winters now, I'm not sure why but some of my friends in the nearby village have theories. I just know I need to keep a low profile.
lines.label: forestProblems2

lines.speaker: NAME
lines.text: I've got a potato soup cooking on the fire back at the camp. Can't imagine you've had anything to eat for a while!
lines.label: askForFood

lines.speaker: NAME
lines.text: Woah, steady on your feet-- don't worry, I'll help you along.
lines.label: headToCamp
